snippet.title: SLAM TILT (AMIGA "AGA")
snippet.description:
Zeus presents Slam Tilt (un-emulated) for the Amiga A1200, a true classic from the golden era of amiga gaming which must not be forgotten alongside the software house and all programmers that were involved in making this game.

Year of release: 1996

Considered by many to be the definitive pinball game ever made, Slam Tilt takes the likes of Pinball Dreams & Fantasies to another level.
The ball weight ratio is perfect, not too heavy, not too light, tons of features including multiball where you will find the screen shrink down allowing you to see all the balls flying around, and the best part is it has some brilliant scoreboard effects including sub games.
A must for any pinball fan especially if you liked Pinball Dreams & Fantasies, my favourite is the dark table (Demon).
I've included all 4 tables even though i'm certainly not the best at it lol.

TABLES:
MEAN MACHINES - 4:40
PIRATE - 12:04
ACE OF SPACE - 20:17
DEMON - 23:58.

I hope all you Amiga fans enjoy this upload.

A huge thanks goes out to fellow Youtuber Alex76gr https://www.youtube.com/user/alex76gr for supplying this game on floppies for my A1200, please check out his gaming channel.

Please note: NONE of my game uploads are emulated in any way whatsoever, they are 100% original recordings by myself taken directly from the original hardware the game was intended for, that way you know you're watching the real thing.
I will also always state weather i am using any cheats in the game, if not mentioned then i am not using any.
Check out my channel (http://www.youtube.com/user/ZEUSDAZ/videos), dedicated to gamers who loved the games of yesteryear.

Switch to 480p for better quality and feel free to leave comments on my channel and vid's.

Keeping the memory of the Amiga and it's cool games alive!!!
